Self-Hosted & Open Source

Complete control over your infrastructure. Host on your own servers, keep your data private, and avoid vendor lock-in.

SDK Compatible

Already using the Apify SDK? Great! Your existing code works here too. No rewrites needed, just point and run.

Built for Crawlee

First-class support for Crawlee (Playwright, Cheerio, Puppeteer) scrapers. Optimized for high-performance crawling.
